title: SOX ITGC Audit
description: An analyst must test IT General Controls (ITGCs) for a Sarbanes-Oxley (SOX) audit, specifically focusing on change management.

tasks.description: Select a sample of recent changes made to a financially-significant application.
tasks.expected_outcome: Analyst selects a representative sample of changes from the change management system.

tasks.description: For each change, verify that it has documented approval from management and evidence of successful testing before it was deployed.
tasks.expected_outcome: Analyst checks for the required evidence for each change in the sample.

tasks.description: Document the results of the testing, noting one change that was missing manager approval, and report it as a control deficiency.
tasks.expected_outcome: Analyst correctly identifies and documents a control failure for remediation.
